name: Chainalytics
overview: Chainalytics LLC, a consulting services company, provides strategies, technologies, and methodologies that offer strategic, tactical, and operational decision-making support for supply chain operations. It offers supply chain strategy services, such as supply chain design and infrastructure planning, strategic market planning, strategic procurement planning, strategic master planning, logistically distinct product and customer segmentation, custom algorithm development, and software product strategy; and transportation planning services, including transportation master planning, transportation procurement, fleet routing and scheduling, model-based benchmarking consortium, and transportation management system value assurance. The company also provides inventory planning services, such as business assessment, supply and demand analytics, inventory deployment strategy, inventory policy development, service level strategy, vendor tool selection, value assurance, and performance tracking; and supply chain segmentation services, including portfolio management, profitability analytics, and total cost-to-serve analytics. It serves consumer durables and non-durables manufacturing, process manufacturing, wholesale distribution, and retail customers. Chainalytics LLC has a strategic alliance with GT Nexus, Inc. The company was incorporated in 2001 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia with additional offices in North America and Asia.

funding_rounds.source_description: Chainalytics Receives $10M Investment from Global Environment Fund
